医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
英国的药品支付披露系统未能保护患者和公众信任英国巴斯大学和瑞典隆德大学的研究人员在《BMJ Evidence》上发表的一项新分析显示，英国披露制药公司向医疗保健专业人员和组织付款的自我监管系统未能保护患者和公众信任。 -基础医学。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/UKs-drug- payment-disclosure-system-fails-to-protect-病人-and-public-trust.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/UKs-drug- payment-disclosure-system-fails-to-protect-病人-and-public-trust.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0e23fbd4-09d6-4231-9742-d26b23654f56 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 09:15:16 -0500 UK's drug payment disclosure system fails to protect patients and public trust
新测试预测肺癌生存率优于现行标准弗朗西斯·克里克研究所、伦敦大学学院癌症研究所和伦敦大学学院医院的研究人员表明，一种名为 ORACLE 的测试可以比目前使用的临床风险因素更好地预测诊断时肺癌的生存情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/New-test-predicts-lung-cancer-survival-better-than-current-standards.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/New-test-predicts-lung-cancer-survival-better-than-current-standards.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b1e8da1-9a8e-4d60-b2f9-68861d74a4a0 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 08:53:55 -0500 New test predicts lung cancer survival better than current standards
性别种族微侵犯被发现会导致产后血压升高根据今天发表在美国心脏协会同行评审期刊《高血压》上的新研究，通过微侵犯造成的基于性别的种族主义可能与产后及产后血压升高有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Gendered-racial-microaggressions-found-to-raise-blood-Pressure-after-childbirth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Gendered-racial-microaggressions-found-to-raise-blood-Pressure-after-childbirth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ff3ebf5b-bd81-4833-aef5-ede4aa3b3d95 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 08:20:16 -0500 Gendered racial microaggressions found to raise blood pressure after childbirth
研究将纤维消耗与具有抗癌作用的表观遗传变化联系起来众所周知，纤维是健康饮食的重要组成部分，但只有不到 10% 的美国人摄入了最低推荐量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Study-links-fibre-conspiration-to-epigenic-changes-with-anti-cancer-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Study-links-fibre-conspiration-to-epigenic-changes-with-anti-cancer-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f2e75bd-152d-47c0-8027-8afbc6e2dcb7 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 08:10:48 -0500 Study links fiber consumption to epigenetic changes with anti-cancer effects
新分子有望保护小鼠免受流感侵害瑞典哥德堡大学的研究人员与中国同事合作，发现了一种类似抗体的分子，可以保护小鼠免受各种流感病毒的侵害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/New-molecule-shows-promise-in-protecting-mice-from-influenza.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/New-molecule-shows-promise-in-protecting-mice-from-influenza.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe1eca76-fa2d-4e52-8a8d-b8ab6e3d1862 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 07:25:00 -0500 New molecule shows promise in protecting mice from influenza
希腊北部学龄前儿童报告细小病毒 B19 心肌炎病例心肌炎是一种罕见但严重的疾病，因心肌（也称为心肌）炎症而闻名。在严重的心肌炎病例中，心肌变得极其虚弱，无法有效地泵血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Parvovirus-B19-myocarditis-cases-reported-in-preschoolers-from-Northern-Greece.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Parvovirus-B19-myocarditis-cases-reported-in-preschoolers-from-Northern-Greece.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2afd48ef-0427-4c46-ae9d-4fce3024af17 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 07:01:17 -0500 Parvovirus B19 myocarditis cases reported in preschoolers from Northern Greece
肠道微生物和身体共同调节脂肪代谢威尔康奈尔医学院和康奈尔大学伊萨卡校区博伊斯汤普森研究所的研究人员进行的一项新的临床前研究表明，有益的肠道微生物和身体共同作用，微调脂肪代谢和胆固醇水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Gut-microbes-and-the-body-work-together-to-regulate-fat-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Gut-microbes-and-the-body-work-together-to-regulate-fat-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=95b917eb-b657-4ce9-9bcb-df40b286cb9e Thu, 09 Jan 2025 06:47:29 -0500 Gut microbes and the body work together to regulate fat metabolism
母乳药物与母乳中蛋白质和脂肪水平的变化有关母亲使用抗抑郁和抗炎药物对母乳成分的影响表明蛋白质和脂肪水平降低，影响婴儿营养。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Maternal-medications-linked-to-changes-in- Protein-and-fat-levels-in- human-milk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Maternal-medications-linked-to-changes-in- Protein-and-fat-levels-in- human-milk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dee0ac79-f7f6-499d-9fe6-1e91bc65ea2c Thu, 09 Jan 2025 06:43:00 -0500 Maternal medications linked to changes in protein and fat levels in human milk
揭示神经元迁移的推拉机制千里之行始于足下，但对于发育中的神经元来说，这第一步依赖于多个信号通路的协作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Unraveling-the-push-pull-mechanism-of-neuron-migration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Unraveling-the-push-pull-mechanism-of-neuron-migration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3af9a243-64b5-4e12-b6e1-8a0f4d7f0fa5 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 06:31:38 -0500 Unraveling the push-pull mechanism of neuron migration
在妊娠期糖尿病研究中，口服药物预防大婴儿的效果不如胰岛素一项比较口服降糖药与胰岛素治疗妊娠期糖尿病的研究发现，在预防大于胎龄儿方面并无非劣效性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Oral-medications-less- effective-than-insulin-for-preventing-large-babies-in-gestational-diabetes-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250109/Oral-medications-less- effective-than-insulin-for-preventing-large-babies-in-gestational-diabetes-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62820f26-45f2-4427-bf94-66d87c023e83 Thu, 09 Jan 2025 06:05:00 -0500 Oral medications less effective than insulin for preventing large babies in gestational diabetes study
